FuncDef: This command displays the candidate configuration along with line numbers that can be used for editing the candidate configuration.

ParaDef.Info: Displays the candidate configuration starting at the point indicated by the following options (the display is not limited to the current CLI context/branch). Values-line, offset, first, edit-point, last, |line |absolute line number, |offset|relative line number to current edit point. Prefixed with '+' or '-', |first |keyword - first line, |edit-point |keyword - current edit point , |last |keyword - last line that is not 'exit'.
